questions.question: What is the primary function of TensorFlow in deep learning?
options: Building and training machine learning models
questions.correctAnswer: Building and training machine learning models

questions.question: Which TensorFlow function is typically used to construct a neural network?
In deep learning with TensorFlow, what is the purpose of an activation function?
options: To introduce non-linearity in the model
questions.correctAnswer: To introduce non-linearity in the model

questions.question: Which of the following is a popular optimizer in TensorFlow?
What does the function 'model.compile()' in TensorFlow do?
Which type of neural network is commonly used for image classification tasks in TensorFlow?
What is the typical loss function used in TensorFlow for binary classification problems?
What does the function 'model.fit()' in TensorFlow do?
options: Tests the model on new data
Trains the model using the training data
questions.correctAnswer: Trains the model using the training data

questions.question: Which library is integrated into TensorFlow to create neural network layers more easily?
What is the purpose of dropout in a neural network model in TensorFlow?
options: To reduce the size of the network
To avoid overfitting by randomly dropping neurons
questions.correctAnswer: To avoid overfitting by randomly dropping neurons
